casebody.data:
Third Department,

August, 1972

(August 9, 1972) The People of the State of New York, Appellant, v. Michael Talutis, Respondent.

Motion for reargument denied. Decision and order modified to indicate that the reversal was on the law alone. Herlihy, P. J., Staley, Jr., Greenhlott, Sweeney and Simons, JJ., concur.
